column1: Don't be afraid to take a big step.  You can't cross a chasm in two small jumps.
Keep in mind that home is where the heart is.
A kiss is not a kiss without the heart.
Fear is just excitement in need of an attitude adjustment.
Everybody feels lucky for having you as a friend.
You will be selected for a promotion because of your accomplishments.
You are admired for your adventurous ways.
Never miss a chance to keep your mouth shut.
In human endeavor chance favors the prepared mind.
The great joy in life is doing what people say you cannot do.
